thread.title: Drake's "Hotline Bling" is the greatest meme
thread.title_full: Drake's "Hotline Bling" is the greatest meme

title: Drake's "Hotline Bling" is the greatest meme
text:
By John Boone ET Online October 20, 2015, 5:51 PM Drake's "Hotline Bling" dancing just became the greatest meme on the Internet Drake performs at O2 Arena on March 24, 2014, in London. Getty Images More + 
Remember #Beyonc√©AlwaysOnBeat? 
It was that meme that proved that Queen B is perfect -- like we didn't already know -- and no matter what music you play over a video of her dancing, she will always be on beat . Here's a late-in-the-game addition appropriate for the approaching All Hallows' Eve. 
Well, it works for Drake's dancing in his new "Hotline Bling" video , too. First, watch the video to fully enjoy Drizzy dad dancing like no one's watching: 
Drake has moves for any beat: 
No matter what genre you play: 
Look at him doing the "Cha Cha Slide" like he's at his cousin's wedding! 
Girls truly do just want to have fun! And Drake just wants to daaaance! 
It's just too good. Champagne Papi himself thinks the meme hilarious: A video posted by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Oct 19, 2015 at 8:31pm PDT Copyright (c) 2015 CBS Studios Inc. All Rights Reserved. Shares
